scripts.copy-env: npm run copy-env:backend && npm run copy-env:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run copy-env:backend && npm run copy-env:frontend && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean:backend: npx rimraf ./backend/node_modules && npx rimraf ./backend/package-lock.json && npx rimraf ./backend/.env
scripts.clean:frontend: npx rimraf ./frontend/node_modules && npx rimraf ./frontend/package-lock.json && npx rimraf ./frontend/.env && npx rimraf ./frontend/coverage && npx rimraf ./frontend/build
scripts.clean:all: npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf package-lock.json && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.start:backend: npm run copy-env:backend && cd backend && npm start
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run copy-env:frontend && cd frontend && npm run dev
scripts.start: concurrently -n 'backend,frontend' -c 'blue,magenta' "npm run start:backend" "npm run copy-env:frontend && cd frontend && npm run build:serve"
scripts.test:clean: npx rimraf ./frontend/coverage && cd frontend && npm run test
